code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./GetInTouch.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GetInTouch=()=>{const[emailInputValue,setEmailInputValue]=useState("");const[messageInputValue,setMessageInputValue]=useState("");return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"get-in-touch",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"title-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title",children:"Get In Touch"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text",children:["Let me know what you think",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"I look forward to hearing from you"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"email-field",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text",children:"E-mail:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"email-input",value:emailInputValue,onChange:e=>setEmailInputValue(e.target.value),placeholder:"Please enter your e-mail"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"message-input",value:emailInputValue,onChange:e=>setEmailInputValue(e.target.value),placeholder:"Please enter your message"})]})]});};export default GetInTouch;
